2025.title: Android Studio Koala
2025.description: Android Studio Koala is the latest IDE version in 2025, focusing on improved performance, Kotlin Multiplatform support, and integrated AI assistance via Gemini in Android Studio. It introduces an upgraded Compose UI preview, live editing, and enhanced emulator tools.

2025.title: Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM)
2025.description: KMM is now stable in 2025, allowing developers to write shared business logic for Android and iOS in Kotlin. Integrated deeply into Android Studio with templates and Gradle support, it's a go-to for cross-platform teams.

2025.title: Jetpack Compose 1.6
2025.description: Jetpack Compose has matured into the primary UI toolkit in Android with version 1.6, introducing performance optimizations, Wear OS enhancements, and Compose for TV and tablets.

2025.title: Gemini AI in Android Studio
2025.description: Gemini AI has been embedded into Android Studio to assist with code suggestions, documentation lookup, refactoring, and even Jetpack Compose layout generation, greatly accelerating development.

2025.title: Firebase Genkit
2025.description: Firebase Genkit integrates GenAI into Android apps via Firebase, enabling smart replies, summarization, content generation, and personalization within mobile apps using LLMs like Gemini or PaLM.

2025.title: Baseline Profiles + Perfetto
2025.description: Android now mandates optimized startup performance using Baseline Profiles, with integrated performance profiling via Perfetto, giving developers precise visibility into jank, startup, and power use.

2025.title: App Quality Insights
2025.description: Integrated with Firebase Crashlytics, App Quality Insights in Android Studio gives real-time crash data, stack traces, and contextual device info inside the IDE, streamlining bug fixing workflows.

2025.title: Now in Android (Open Source App)
2025.description: Google’s flagship open source app, Now in Android, is updated in 2025 to showcase best practices for architecture (Modular, MVI), Jetpack libraries, Compose, KMM, and AI tool integrations.

2025.title: TachiyomiSY
2025.description: An advanced open-source manga reader app rebuilt in 2025 using Compose Multiplatform, demonstrating cross-platform design, navigation patterns, and ML-powered recommendations.

2025.title: OpenAI Whisper Integration for Voice UX
2025.description: Whisper by OpenAI is now being used in Android apps for real-time transcription and speech-to-text in accessibility, podcasting, and language learning apps.

2025.title: Android 15 Release
2025.description: Android 15 emphasizes privacy, on-device AI, and power efficiency. It introduces 'Private Space', system-level Gemini integration, improved thermal management APIs, and adaptive refresh rate controls.

2025.title: Compose Multiplatform 1.7
2025.description: JetBrains’ Compose Multiplatform 1.7 brings unified UI code for Android, Desktop, iOS, and Web, now production-ready with advanced layout APIs and Material 3 design components.

2025.title: Material You 3.2
2025.description: Material You evolves with new adaptive color theming APIs, extended typography scaling, and accessibility-driven layout guidance, aligning Android design with inclusive UI trends.

2025.title: Android Performance SDK
2025.description: A new SDK offering profiling libraries for developers to track frame rendering, CPU usage, and startup times programmatically — part of the broader Android Performance initiative.

2025.title: Google Play Integrity API v2
2025.description: The Play Integrity API v2 strengthens app security against tampering and piracy, now offering real-time Play Protect attestation and hardware-backed integrity verification.

2025.title: Wear OS 5
2025.description: Wear OS 5 in 2025 introduces adaptive tiles, health service APIs powered by Fitbit AI, and improved performance with reduced power drain for continuous heart rate tracking.

2025.title: Gemini Nano on Device
2025.description: Gemini Nano, a lightweight LLM variant, is now available on select Android 15+ devices for offline summarization, message replies, and smart text generation without cloud dependency.

2025.title: ARCore 3.0
2025.description: ARCore 3.0 enhances augmented reality on Android with real-world occlusion accuracy, light estimation 2.0, and integration with the Sceneform Jetpack library for AR composables.

2025.title: LlamaFirewall
2025.description: LlamaFirewall is an open-source guardrail framework introduced in mid-2025 to mitigate security risks from AI-driven Android apps, ensuring safe and ethical LLM integration.

2025.title: Android for Cars SDK 2.1
2025.description: Android Auto and Android Automotive SDK 2.1 focus on driver safety and multi-screen UI support, enabling new apps for EV management and in-car voice assistants powered by Gemini.
